description: This file defines a central routing mechanism for a Flutter app, including route generation and a navigation shell with a bottom navigation bar.

classes.name: AppRouter
classes.description: A class that provides route management for the app, including route generation based on route names.

classes.name: _Shell
classes.description: A StatefulWidget that provides a navigation shell with a bottom navigation bar, managing navigation state.

methods.name: onGenerateRoute
methods.description: Generates routes based on the route name, returning the appropriate screen widget.

methods.name: _indexFromRoute
methods.description: Converts route names to bottom navigation bar indices.

methods.name: _routeFromIndex
methods.description: Converts bottom navigation bar indices to route names.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Builds the widget tree for the navigation shell, including the bottom navigation bar.
